Bicep curl.description: isolates biceps to give bigger arms and strength. Targets long and short head of bicep.
Bicep curl.tip: Don't swing your elbows and lock them in by placing them by your sides.

Tricep Pushdown.description: isolates triceps and improved arm size and definition.Targets lateral head of tricep.
Tricep Pushdown.tip: Keep your core tight and don't let the arms come all the way to top to maintain tension.

Bayesian curl.description: targets biceps and increased muscle tension. Reduced risk of imbalances and targets long head
Bayesian curl.tip: Keep your stance perfect so you're stable.

Overhead tricep extension.description: good for adding size to tricep. Targets the long head of tricep.
Overhead tricep extension.tip: Don't let your arms go too back.

Hack Squat.description: targets quads heavily while also engaging glutes. Provides support for back and helps build lower body strength.
Hack Squat.tip: Keep your knees soft and don't lock them in.

Leg Press.description: compound movement for lower body strength and mass. Less strain on lower back compared to squats.
Leg Press.tip: Keep knees soft and don't curl let the back round up. Keep it firm.

Leg Extension.description: isolates the quadriceps for definition and strength. Great for knee stability and hypertrophy.
Leg Extension.tip: Don't go too heavy on weight because it will effect the knees.

Incline Dumbbell Chest Press.description: targets upper portion of the pectoral muscles. Helps create a fuller upper chest and balanced chest development.

Cable Flys High to Low.description: isolation exercise that emphasizes middle and lower chest fibers. Provides constant tension through full range of motion.

Lat Pulldown.description: strengthens latissimus dorsi and builds width in the back. Ideal for improving pull-up performance.

Barbell Row.description: compound movement for thickness in the back. Also strengthens lower back and core when done with proper form.

High Row.description: targets upper back and rear deltoids for a wider and more developed upper body. Enhances posture and pulling power.

Russian Twists.description: rotational core exercise that targets the obliques. Improves core stability and rotational strength.

Sit Ups.description: classic core exercise targeting the upper abs. Helps build abdominal endurance and strength.

Planks.description: isometric hold that engages the full core, including transverse abdominis and stabilizer muscles. Builds endurance and stability.

Stair Master.description: high-intensity cardio machine that targets lower body muscles while improving heart health and endurance.

Cycling.description: low-impact cardio that improves cardiovascular fitness and leg endurance. Can be used for steady-state or HIIT.

Incline Treadmill.description: walking or running on incline increases lower body engagement and burns more calories. Great for fat loss and endurance.
